Description.Text: Facilities The hotel features 99 accommodation units. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. The hotel offers a range of amenities for a comfortable stay, including gastronomic options such as a restaurant, a dining area and a bar. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Other services include room service. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area (no extra charge). In addition, a conference room and a business centre are also available. Rooms The hotel offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. All rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Guests will also find a balcony in most rooms. The accommodation units each feature a sofa-bed. A safe and a desk also feature. A fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment contribute to a comfortable stay. Internet access, a telephone and wireless internet access are provided as standard. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub, a spa bath and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hot tub offers revitalisation. Cycling/mountain biking, a gym, a spa, a sauna, a steam bath, hydrotherapy and Ayurveda are among the leisure options available. Meals Breakfast is bookable as a board option.
